story:
Once upon a time, in the lush green forests of Vietnam, there lived a little monkey named Binh. Binh was known for his mischievous antics and playful nature. Every day, he would swing from tree to tree, chattering with his animal friends and causing all sorts of mischief in the forest.

One day, as the sun began to set and the moon started to rise, Binh decided to explore a new part of the forest that he had never been to before. As he journeyed deeper into the forest, he noticed a warm, soft glow coming from behind a cluster of trees. Curious, Binh followed the light and discovered a clearing where a magical lantern was hanging from a tree branch.

Intrigued by the lantern's beauty, Binh reached out and touched it gently. To his amazement, the lantern lit up with a soft, warm light that filled the entire clearing. Suddenly, a wise old owl appeared before Binh and spoke in a gentle, soothing voice.

"Hello, young Binh," said the owl. "I am the Guardian of the Forest, and I have been waiting for you. The light from this lantern represents the power of kindness and compassion. Only those who have a pure heart can unlock its true potential."

Binh listened intently as the owl explained that the lantern had the power to grant wishes to those who used it selflessly. Excited and full of wonder, Binh thought of all the ways he could help his friends in the forest with the lantern's magic.

From that day on, Binh used the lantern's light to bring happiness, peace, and harmony to the forest and its inhabitants. He helped the birds find their missing eggs, guided lost animals back to their families, and spread joy wherever he went.

As the nights passed, Binh became known as the Forest's Guardian, revered by all for his kindness and selflessness. The lantern's light continued to shine brightly, illuminating the forest with its magical glow.

And so, every night, as the stars twinkled above, Binh would gather his friends around the lantern, sharing stories of love and friendship until they drifted off to sleep under the watchful eye of the Guardian of the Forest.

And as your eyelids grow heavy with dreams, my dear child, remember the tale of Binh the monkey and his magical lantern, and may its light guide you through the night with love and warmth. Goodnight, and sweet dreams, my precious son.
